bibl.title: Nicocles and Ptolemy - Remarks on the Early History of Nea Paphos.
bibl.note: The Beginnings of Nea Paphos should be linked with Nicocles as much as with Ptolemy Soter (and Ptolemy Philadelphos).
Daszewski Wiktor Andrzej, Nicocles and Ptolemy - Remarks on the Early History of Nea Paphos.
